mapper.sql: id, finish_rate, operat_rate, income_rate, cash_rate, cost_rate, use_capital, add_date, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from capital
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into capital
id,
finish_rate,
operat_rate,
income_rate,
cash_rate,
cost_rate,
use_capital,
add_date,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cashRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{costRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{useCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{addDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update capital
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
finish_rate = #{record.finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
operat_rate = #{record.operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income_rate = #{record.incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cash_rate = #{record.cashRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_rate = #{record.costRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
use_capital = #{record.useCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
add_date = #{record.addDate,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update capital set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finish_rate = #{record.finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, operat_rate = #{record.operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income_rate = #{record.incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cash_rate = #{record.cashRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_rate = #{record.costRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, use_capital = #{record.useCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_date = #{record.addDate,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update capital
finish_rate = #{finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
operat_rate = #{operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income_rate = #{incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cash_rate = #{cashRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_rate = #{costRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
use_capital = #{useCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update capital set finish_rate = #{finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, operat_rate = #{operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income_rate = #{incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cash_rate = #{cashRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_rate = #{costRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, use_capital = #{useCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select finish_rate,operat_rate,income_rate,cash_rate,cost_rate,use_capital, DATE_FORMAT(add_date,#{period}) as remark from capital where DATE_FORMAT(add_date,#{period}) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(add_date,#{period})
select finish_rate,operat_rate,income_rate,cash_rate,cost_rate,use_capital, YEAR(add_date) as remark from capital where YEAR(add_date) >= YEAR(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 YEAR)) GROUP BY YEAR(add_date)

select finish_rate,operat_rate,income_rate,cash_rate,cost_rate,use_capital, MONTH(add_date) as remark from capital where DATE_FORMAT(add_date,'%Y-%m-01') >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(add_date,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(add_date,'%Y-%m')
